title: Promote Draft Version 73 to Live/Production

requirements.text: Promote draft version 73 to the Live/Production channel by ensuring `frontend/.release/production-version.txt` references draft version `73`, and perform the release promotion as a metadata-only change (no application source code changes).
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/.release/production-version.txt` contains exactly `73` as the promoted production draft version.
No files under `frontend/src/` are modified as part of this promotion.
After deployment, end users are served draft version 73 in the live/production channel.

constraints: Promotion must be metadata-only per `frontend/.release/README.md` (do not modify application source files under `frontend/src/`).
Do not introduce any rebuild/recompilation changes beyond what is required for promotion.
nonGoals: Do not implement or modify any app features (including the strike-through behavior issue) as part of this request.
Do not change backend canister code or Motoko state.
